configSchema.description: Configuration for connecting to this MCP server

capabilities.name: get-token-metadata
capabilities.description: Returns the metadata for a given token address stored in the database.

capabilities.name: get-token-marketdata
capabilities.description: Returns current market-level metrics like price, mcap, txns, holder count, and buy/sell activity. Supports optional time window via 'interval'.

capabilities.name: get-token-holders
capabilities.description: Returns holder wallet addresses and percentage ownership for a given token address.

capabilities.name: get-trending-tokens
capabilities.description: Returns a list of trending tokens ordered by transaction count for a given interval.

capabilities.name: search-tokens
capabilities.description: Performs a flexible search for tokens by name, symbol, or address, with optional filters, sorting, and symbol-only mode.

capabilities.name: get-latest-graduated-tokens
capabilities.description: Fetches the most recently graduated tokens, ordered by graduation time (descending).

capabilities.name: get-token-ath
capabilities.description: Fetches the all-time high (ATH) market cap for a token, starting from its graduation time.

capabilities.name: get-tokens-by-deployer
capabilities.description: Returns a list of tokens where the specified wallet address is the developer (devWallet).

capabilities.name: get-token-history
capabilities.description: Fetches historical price, market cap, or liquidity snapshots for a token across multiple time windows.

capabilities.name: get-token-by-pool
capabilities.description: Fetches token metadata for a given pool (market) address.

capabilities.name: get-token-performance
capabilities.description: Returns percentage performance change for selected metrics over multiple time windows compared to the current value.

capabilities.name: get-token-price
capabilities.description: Returns the latest price, market cap, and liquidity for a specific token address.

capabilities.name: get-wallet-holdings
capabilities.description: Retrieve the token holdings of a given wallet address, including balances and percentage ownership per token.

capabilities.name: get-wallet-token-pnl
capabilities.description: Calculate realized and unrealized profit and loss (PnL) for a wallet on a specific token.

capabilities.name: get-token-history-range
capabilities.description: Returns the lowest and highest values of selected metrics (price, market cap, liquidity) within a specified time range for a token.

capabilities.name: get-mcp-config
capabilities.description: Exposes MCP discovery schema for Smithery and other MCP clients.
